text: Gattuso is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Gennaro Gattuso (born 1978), football manager and former player * Greg Gattuso (born 1962), football coach * James Gattuso (born 1957), research fellow * Sébastien Gattuso (born 1971), athlete * Stefano Gattuso (born 1984), racing driver Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Gattuso
